aboutMe.details: With over 2 years of experience in frontend and full-stack development, I specialize in building modern web applications using technologies like React, Vue.js, TypeScript, and .NET Core. I focus on delivering clean, responsive user interfaces and efficient backend systems that enhance performance and usability.

jobs.achievement: Migrated legacy app to Vue 2 for better UX and maintainability. Built full-stack app with Vue 3, TypeScript, .NET 8, Sitecore, and Solr. Delivered secure MVP using React.js, Google OAuth, and CASA standards. Boosted performance with service workers.

projects.title: Video Streaming Application
projects.description: Built a scalable video streaming app with React JS & C++, featuring adaptive streaming and real-time analytics.

projects.title: Web Blog Post
projects.description: A blog post application where user can create, read, update and delete blog posts.

projects.title: Social Media App
projects.description: The app allows users to create accounts, connect with friends, share posts, and interact with others through comments, likes, and instant messaging.
projects.technologies: React JS, Node JS,GraphQL,MongoDB, RESTful API
